meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6651.

td.p: Deborah Stowell, a library shelver and pet sitter from St. Charles, Illinois
Bradley King, a theater and opera lighting designer from New York, New York
Mark Japinga, a legislative researcher from Washington, D.C. (whose 2-day cash winnings total $59,499)

tr.td: 1983--30 YEARS AGO
NATURAL WONDERS
VWLLSS
OTHER JULY OBSERVANCES
HIGH
"MIGHTY"
